instruction: Can I work while attending Jedha Bootcamp part-time?
output: Yes, the part-time program is specifically designed for students who work or have other commitments. Classes are scheduled in the evenings and on weekends to accommodate busy schedules.

instruction: What support is available if I have difficulty understanding course material?
output: Jedha offers various support options, including access to instructors, mentors, and a community of peers. Students can ask questions during live sessions, use online forums, or book one-on-one sessions if they need additional help.

Jedha Bootcamp is not formally accredited in the same way as universities, but it has a strong reputation in the tech industry, particularly in Europe. Their programs are well-regarded by employers, and many alumni find success in tech roles.

instruction: Will I receive a certification upon completing a Jedha Bootcamp program?
output: Yes, students who successfully complete their program at Jedha receive a certificate of completion, which can be added to their LinkedIn profile and resume to showcase their skills to potential employers.
